com.scriptedmc.script.util.text

Class SMCTextComponent<T extends net.minecraft.util.text.ITextComponent>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scriptedmc.script.internal.ScriptObject<T>
      • com.scriptedmc.script.util.text.SMCTextComponent<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - MC text component
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SMCTextComponentString, SMCTextComponentTranslation

    public class SMCTextComponent<T extends net.minecraft.util.text.ITextComponent>
extends ScriptObject<T>
    Represents formatted text. You cannot create it directly, use SMCTextComponentString or SMCTextComponentTranslation
